939830.name: WHEEL TRAVEL
939830.description:
WHEEL TRAVEL is a game about traveling in "your" car.
Own and customize cars, earn money by transporting cargo and more, and explore a vast off-road world.

It has been in development for a very long time, but it still lacks content and has many bugs and problematic features. See the release notes for details.

An example of an element implemented in the current game
・Car customization: In addition to changing bumpers and increasing tire diameter, you can also swap engines, replace suspensions, and set decals.
・Vehicle type: There is only one type. We are planning to add light four-wheel drive vehicles, and we are also considering adding two-wheeled vehicles.
・Off-road vehicle behavior: It's not a perfect physics calculation, but we're working on it.
・Travel: You can travel seamlessly on a 15km north-south map. However, the current density is not sufficient. It's a post-apocalyptic world view, and there are meaningful buildings, but you can't know the background even if you explore.
- Cargo Transport: Currently, only 3 types of cargo are implemented.
